summary: Alpha release, Unrelenting Force enchantment for weapons.
descriptionHtml:
No clue what I'm doing, I'm not a modder.

I made a weapon called Falcon Dagger because the Falcon Punch mod I tried to download didn't work properly. I used none of that mod in this mod, so no credit attributed to the former beyond conceptual credit (Though in fairness I only found that mod because I was looking for a mod to add Falcon Punches to the game)

It's disenchantable, thus giving you access to a Falcon Punch enchantment that can go on ANY weapon.

Eventually I'd like to see this added to a variety of fist weapons. Ideally something that's similar to Captain Falcon's gloves.

Who knows. I'm perfectly content with having the ability to put this on any weapon as-is.

Don't expect a lot of me for updates, troubleshooting, or development, and if you want to use this in your mods, or edit it, or fix it, or build off of it, go right ahead, just link back here or link me to your version because I'll probably use it instead of mine. =P
author: Me
